articles.description: Two managers tasted their first experience of Women's Super League action on Friday and only one came out with a victory - but both made statements.
articles.title: Chelsea 1-0 Aston Villa: New managers put down statements in WSL's opening fixture

articles.description: Watch on iPlayer and follow live text as Wales Women play their final WXV warm-up game against Australia Women in Newport.
articles.title: Wales Women vs Australia Women LIVE: Women's rugby union international - TV coverage, live scores and text updates

articles.description: Anthony Joshua was slightly the heavier man than Daniel Dubois as the heavyweights weighed in for their world title fight on Saturday.
articles.title: Joshua vs Dubois: AJ heavier than champion for world title fight at Wembley

articles.description: Ferrari’s Charles Leclerc sets the pace ahead of McLaren’s Lando Norris in first practice at the Singapore Grand Prix.
articles.title: Singapore Grand Prix 2024: Charles Leclerc fastest in first practice ahead of Lando Norris

articles.description: Manchester City manager Pep Guardiola says any change regarding football's increasing fixture demands "must come from the players".
articles.title: Player workload: Manchester City boss Pep Guardiola says change must be player-led

articles.description: Bryce Young's benching by the Carolina Panthers, 18 games after being picked number one overall, is a brutal example of the cut-throat world of the NFL, writes Phoebe Schecter.
articles.title: Phoebe Schecter NFL column: Bryce Young - can the 2023 number one pick recover from benching?

articles.description: A former manager of Fulham's women's team says extra precautions were put in place to protect female players from the club's late owner Mohamed Al Fayed.
articles.title: Mohamed Al Fayed: Fulham 'protected' women's players from former owner

articles.description: Los Angeles Dodgers superstar Shohei Ohtani makes baseball history by becoming the first player to hit 50 home runs and steal 50 bases in a season.
articles.title: Shohei Ohtani: Los Angeles Dodgers star makes baseball history with 50th home run

articles.description: Manchester United forward Marcus Rashford is returning to his best form after taking control of his career, manager Erik ten Hag says.
articles.title: Marcus Rashford: Manchester United forward back on form after 'taking control' says Erik ten Hag

articles.description: A look at Daniel Dubois' ascent from a 'shrinking violet' to heavyweight hilltop before his world-title defence against Anthony Joshua.
articles.title: Anthony Joshua vs Daniel Dubois: How champion went from shy teenager to heavyweight star
